extensionDescription.message: Configure which tab to select after closing the current tab.

commandOrderDescription.message: After closing the current tab, try selecting in this order:

closeShortcut.message: Shortcut to close the current tab

compatibilityNote.message: The parent, sibling, child, unread child tab options only work with Firefox 57 or later.

bug1366290Mitigation.message: If your browser are affected by Firefox's Bug 1366290 (version 56 or earlier), check this to mitigate it

disableFromNewTab.message: Disable if the closed tab is a newly created about:newtab

shortcutCompatibilityNote.message: Update to Firefox 60 or later for shortcut support.
